description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Inspired by Shigeru Miyamoto’s Mario Bros title, Misfit Battles improves upon its spiritual predecessor by adding increased multi-player functionality, levels, monsters, and artwork culminating in the ultimate platform battle based game! *All first year proceeds go to Child’s Play charity which helps improve the lives of children in hospitals through sharing the joys of playing video games
description.short: Inspired by Shigeru Miyamoto’s Mario Bros title, Misfit Battles improves upon its spiritual predecessor by adding increased multi-player functionality, levels, monsters, and artwork culminating in the ultimate platform battle based game! *All first year proceeds go to Child’s Play charity which helps improve the lives of children in hospitals through sharing the joys of playing video games
